examples.example: 我的奶奶总是笑容满面，非常和蔼可亲。

translate.english: My grandma always has a big smile on her face and is very kind and amiable.

examples.example: 我的奶奶是个特别慈祥和蔼的人，总是乐呵呵地和我们说笑。

translate.english: My grandma is a particularly kind and amiable person, always chatting and laughing with us cheerfully.

examples.example: 我的奶奶厨艺精湛，总是能做出美味的菜肴让大家大快朵颐。

translate.english: My grandma is an excellent cook and can always make delicious dishes for everyone to enjoy.
